Blacknightmare::

The reaven followed at starscream and drillbit. and when she heard 
Startscream's question she said
"May I give a opinion?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: Cyberwolf, Starscream isnt power hungry anymore, ever since he 
became 
> secretly in love with KitKat.  He and Drillbit are leaving the 
Predacons.
> 
> :::Starscream:::
> 
> Starscream: Very well then.  But you havent seen the last of me, 
let me tell 
> you that.
> ::He hears Drillbit's words and smiles::
> Starscream: Good.  Megatron will die sometime, if its by my hand or 
not, we 
> shall have to see.  Now who killed Kitkat?
